article_metadata.description: In response to the Tuesday letter “Obamacare alternative no real improvement” from Doug Todd, I add some numbers to bring home the actual monthly cost of coverage in the individual, "high risk" pool. After retiring and using COBRA for the requisite 18 months, I went to UnitedHealthcare, through AARP, for individual coverage. Because of an old history of such mild conditions as a ruptured lumbar disc with minimal symptoms and treated high blood pressure, I was refused insurance.

og.title: Coverage should redefine ‘risk’
